Installing¶

For production¶

pip3 install .

or

python3 setup.py install

For development¶

pip3 install -e .

or

python3 setup.py develop

The only requirement is setuptools package, which is usually a defacto standard in a python3 installation.

Install with docker¶

docker build -t aztarna_docker .
